duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical responsibility for Sustaining Engineering (lifecycle management) activities and improvement of the R&D portfolio of products.
Support existing product field issues through root cause analysis and continuous improvement.
Drive projects through the change control process, ensuring completion of all activities within compliance.
Manage and drive multiple projects in parallel, driving results to maintain the production line and customer satisfaction.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Mechanical Engineering or equivalent combination of education and experience
